analysis.key_quote: This rule will make it difficult to nearly impossible to do my job with any efficiency. Because I am so far removed from political leadership, I will feel unsafe and fear being fired for any misstep.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization, erosion of employee rights, and the undermining of merit-based systems. The author emphasizes the detrimental impact on morale and job security, which aligns with themes opposing the rule.
